name: Pokémon Soul
description:
This game was released in my channel on Oct31st 2020 and this was me testing the waters of doing game development for the first time! 

 Pokémon Soul is a fan game made by SoulWolfx and has many secrets worth discovering and adventuring through. The game is challenging, so anyone who is fairly new to Pokémon I don't recommend playing this game as a start to your Pokémon series. 

Note: The game lore isn’t direct and the sources you read or talk to are just perspectives, however if you piece together everything then you will discover the truth of this island. The game has a true ending and a secret ending. If anyone need help getting the secret ending here's a hint: find a pinkish text in a temple and make careful dialogue choices with the "person". This is my first ever game so it's not perfect, but I can ensure that it is very playable! Oh and the evolutions that are required by trading and using stones has been changed to levels instead (Including the starters) :P

One last thing, this game is made using RPG Maker and there's a ton of features made by talented people that enhanced this experience a ton! Their names will all be shown in the credits at the end of the game.
